testsuite.name: Feature: The user is able to view, navigate on the proiduct details

testcase.name: The user is able to view, expand and minimize product details, product card and description when clicking on specific item

testcase.name: The user is able to navigate through product details when clicking on the arrow to go to next item

testcase.name: The user is able to navigate back to order from product details when clicking on the back arrow
testcase.classname: The user is able to view, navigate on the proiduct details

testcase.name: The user is able see and use the quick add tool when clicking on an item quantity box
testcase.classname: The user is able to view, navigate on the proiduct details

testcase.name: validate The user is able to use search funtion in the submit order screens when using the search bar
